ygData.subject: Re: New Robes
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Yes you can get robes in Freeport.  They sell two types one is Jr. Apprentice Robes and the other are Sr. Apprentice robes.  I think the Sr ones cost just
ygData.messageBody:
>Message: 25
> Date: Thu, 29 Apr 1999 07:50:50 -0400
> From: "Stefan Raets" <SRAETS@...>
>Subject: New Robes
>
>Does anyone know if I can buy a new set of Wizard's Robes in Freeport?
>I'm in Rivervale now, and none of the shops seems to be selling robes.
>I know I can find them in Erudin, but that's a long trip, and I think
>Freeport is just a bit closer. I don't care about the color (although
>I prefer the red ones from Erudin). I just need robes that will fit
>an Erudite.
>
>Aznyin
>Level 12 Erudite Wizard
>Current Residence: Rivervale [Solusek Ro]

Yes you can get robes in Freeport. They sell two types one is Jr.
Apprentice Robes and the other are Sr. Apprentice robes. I think the Sr
ones cost just under 5 plat but have an AC of 6 and also give some mana.
Not much but something is better than nothing.

The kicker of it is that I am a GNOME. I have been to every city. Even
the Troll and oger city with other characters. There re NO Gnome sized
robes. Not even in Ak'Akanon. I lost my guild robe when I was first
starting out.
Granted my Cloth Tunic has a better AC but I still would like to have a
robe, even if its just for show. Has anyone found a Gnome Sized Robe.
Actually I think they sell one for Magicians Only in Freeport that a Gnome
could wear, but that kind a leaves my Wizard out of the picture......

Lomack
Curse those Racist apparel makers :)
